title: Mountain views, Polished kitchen countertops, Onsite playground
posting_body: Seize your chance to make these peaceful, pet-friendly apartments set in the heart of Henderson, NV your home.
Conveniently located near the Cadence neighborhood with amazing city views of Las Vegas, make our community your new place to truly live!

Mountain views-Wood-style plank flooring                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Featured amenity-Energy efficient appliances including built-in microwave, refrigerator, and dishwasher-Private balcony or patio                                                                                        Featured amenity-Air conditioning with programmable thermostat                                                                                        Featured amenity-Ceiling fans in living areas and bedrooms-Separate dining area-Oversized closets-In-home washer and dryer                                                                                        Featured amenity-Polished kitchen countertops

Relaxing resort-style pool with sundeck and spa                                                                                    Photo                                                                                                                                 Featured amenity-Worry-free 24-hour onsite maintenance-Onsite playground-Fenced dog park with pet watering station                                                                                    Photo                                                                                                                                 Featured amenity-Virtual Moving Concierge: Complimentary address change, set up home services and digital moving announcements-Move-in with NO SECURITY DEPOSIT:

Only a small one-time payment-Barbecue pavilion and picnic area-Resident social lounge with shuffleboard table and foosball-Covered parking                                                                                         Featured amenity-Pet friendly (breed restrictions apply)
